extension.name: Job Log Management
extension.description: This extension provides an API that handles purging old scheduled job log records. It accepts two parameters: 1. days_retained (required) = The number of days to retain records for. Any job logs older than that day range are purged. 2. api_call (optional) = Only purges logs of a specific type(e.g. job.versionCheck) if explicitly mentioned else deletes all based on the above param. A value of "all" will also purge logs for any API call types.
